name: 2048-Village
description:
This is a 2048 game but in a small town. It will end when you reach the biggest tower.
Use the keyboard arrows to move the buildings. Use R to restart the game. Use F1 to change the point of view.

Source code I wrote : https://github.com/hube0005/2048-Town

3D model used : "simple low poly village buildings" (https://skfb.ly/ooIqt) by jeebs is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
